itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the latest breaking news including Bill Cosby’s release from jail thanks to a legal technicality, the death of former two-time Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld, Tucker Carlson’s claim that the NSA has been spying on him and trying to get his show canceled, a transracial British man who got plastic surgery to look Korean, and what’s currently going on with the collapsed Miami condo building.
